message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product, $12000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500, which is the highest I can go at this time.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 is above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $10500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm firm at $9000. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and my budget. I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand that $9000 is your final offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $10000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value and your budget.

Alice, I understand you need a fair price, but $10000 is still above my budget. I'm prepared to go up to $9500.  This is a significant compromise from my initial offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value and my financial limitations.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9500 is still not enough for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. I'm counteroffering at $9750. This is my final compromise, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement at this price.

Alice, I understand you need a good price, but $9750 is still just a little out of my reach. I'm willing to go up to $9600, which is a significant compromise for me. This is my final offer, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price. It would be a great deal for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $9600 is still not enough for me. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. I'm counteroffering at $9800. This is my final compromise, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement at this price.
